p: As previously reported [ 17, 18, 19, 20, 21, 24], this method can be considered robust, with high reproducibility and good sensitivity in the case of not fresh olive oils (at least after three months from their production). For each olive oil sample, the near UV-vis spectra were measured with three replicates, and the values of concentration of the four pigments are expressed as the average value Â± confidence intervals (over three replicates).
